MAHAMMAD JAINUL AVEDIN

Maintenance, installation, etc.

right

customizing Sub Sites, Team Sites, Blogs and Alerts based on company needs

IT  Networking  &  Administration  •  SharePoint  Repair  &  Maintenance  •  Testing  /  Installation  &
Troubleshooting • 
Web Application Development & Maintenance • System Administration • Server Administration • Technical
